objects.text: Active Noise Cancellation • Spatial Audio • Transparency Mode

product_details.name: Apple AirPods Max Wireless Over-Ear Headphones, Pro-Level Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency Mode, Personalised Spatial Audio, USB-C Charging, Bluetooth Headphones for iPhone - Starlight
product_details.description: AirPods Max, the ultimate listening experience. Now in five new colours. An Apple-designed driver provides high-fidelity audio. Every detail, from canopy to cushions, has been designed for an exceptional fit. Pro-level Active Noise Cancellation blocks outside noise, while Transparency mode keeps you connected to your environment. Updated with a USB-C connector for even more convenient charging.

banner_details:
This banner presents a clean and minimalistic promotional design showcasing a premium audio product. The composition centers around a high-quality product image aligned symmetrically over softly blended concentric radial circles, enhancing visual focus. The background consists of a subtle radial gradient with a faint grid and small dot elements for added structure. The text layer with ID **"heading"** serves as the main bold title, followed by the **"tagline"** text conveying a calm and luxurious message. Feature highlights are presented in the **"description"** layer. A bold **"price"** layer emphasizes the value, complemented by a rectangular call-to-action button, ID **"cta_button"**, with the prompt text defined in **"cta"**.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream White: `#F5F0E8`
- Light Taupe: `#E6DFD5`
- Soft Gold: `#D0C5B7`
- Coffee Brown: `#4A4135`
- Warm Gray: `#6D6259`
product_color: The product image showcases a premium headset featuring a soft, neutral color palette, ideal for a modern and minimalist advertisement banner. Key colors include a warm champagne gold (#D6C6B2) on the earcups, blending elegantly with a light cream beige (#EFE6DA) on the headband and ear cushions. The subtle metallic silver (#C0C0C0) accents on the hinges add a touch of sophistication. The colors are harmoniously blended with smooth gradients, creating a soft, luxurious feel while still emphasizing form and structure. These calming tones highlight the product’s elegance and appeal, evoking a sense of comfort and premium quality in the advertisement design.
